authentication-key.label: Authentication Key
authentication-key.helper_text: If using account specific rates, enter your shipping account authentication key here, if applicable.
authentication-key.v8n_too_long: Authentication key must be 50 characters or less.

meter-number.label: Meter Number
meter-number.helper_text: If using account specific rates, enter your shipping account meter number here, if applicable.
meter-number.v8n_too_long: Meter number must be 50 characters or less.

accountid.label: Account ID
accountid.helper_text: If using account specific rates, enter your shipping account id here.
accountid.v8n_too_long: Account ID must be 50 characters or less.

endpoint.label: Endpoint URL
endpoint.helper_text: Enter a URL that we'll poll for shipping rates.
endpoint.v8n_required: Please enter a valid endpoint URL.

password.label: Password
password.helper_text: If using account specific rates, enter your shipping account password here.
password.v8n_too_long: Password must be 50 characters or less.

custom-code.label: Custom Code
custom-code.helper_text: JavaScript used to create and modify shipping rates.
custom-code.v8n_too_long: Please reduce the size of your custom code to 64KB or less.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this shipping method? You won't be able to undo if you click Delete.
